title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
OB: When a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
EB: The DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be ASYNC in this scenario.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Define a ServletRequestListener.
2. Make a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() within the servlet.
3. Observe the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest to see if it is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
